snippet: A new chicken-and-egg dilemma has emerged as more people keep their own hens: the question of how to use an enormous backyard bounty.
abstract: Many urbanites and suburbanites are raising their own hens and many small farmers who supply restaurants with produce have been expanding into poultry, making farm eggs ubiquitous on restaurant menus; eggs that were once scrubbed from the standard American breakfast over concerns about cholesterol have made a triumphant return as high-end appetizers, served atop anything and everything; egg recipes listed.
lead_paragraph: A new chicken-and-egg dilemma has emerged as more people keep their own hens: the question of how to use an enormous backyard bounty.

headline.seo: Hatching Your Own Batch of Eggs
